  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutOfTurnException

    public class IllegalMoveException
extends MoveException
    this is thrown when you try to execute or add an illegal move to the game.

    • Method Detail

      • setMoveString

        public void setMoveString(java.lang.String m)
        if the move wasn't processed, or doesn't yet have sensible data the moveString might have been set. This is basically a way for bad input values to be returned by parsers.

        public java.lang.String getMoveString()
